4. Leisha Nobach

Leisha Nobach
=============

![Leisha Nobach](https://www.arlingtonwa.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=10277 "Leisha Nobach")

**Leisha Nobach, Position 2**
-----------------------------

[Email Leisha Nobach](mailto:leishan@arlingtonwa.gov)

### **Term Information**

Appointed to unexpired term on February 5, 2024.  Term ends December 31, 2025.

### **Occupation**

* Office manager at George R Hussey DDS FAGD (18 years)
* Dental Assistant instructor at Smokey Point Institute of Dental Assisting (13 years)

### **Family**

Married to her husband Randy Nobach for 21 years, they are raising their 3 daughters. Preslee, Holland and Ellis. Resident of the Old Town neighborhood of Arlington since 2005.

### **Education**

* Everett Community College
* Dental Assisting School
* Continuing Education for Dentistry

### **Community Involvement**

* Former City of Arlington Park Arts and Recreation Commission
* Downtown Arlington Business Association member with her husband Randy
* School Board president, Arlington Christian School
* Planning Committee, Arlington High senior night
* Arlington High School Booster Club member
* Women's Ministry leader at Arlington Assembly of God
* Coach at the Boys and Girls Club

### **Hobbies**

* Camping with family in our vintage trailer
* Vacationing in warm places
* Shopping (especially downtown Arlington)

### Affiliations/Associations

###
